MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v3 - A2: Co-participant Demographics

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

INHISP.Description: Does the co-participant report being of Hispanic/Latino ethnicity (i.e., having origins from a mainly Spanish-speaking Latin American country), regardless of race?

INHISPOR.Description: If yes, what are the co-participant's reported origins? (Blank if HISPANIC ≠ 1)

INRACE.Description: What does the co-participant report as his or her race?

Levels.4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

INRASEC.Description: What additional race does co-participant report?

Levels.4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

INRATER.Description: What additional race, beyond those reported in RACE and RACESC, does co-participant report?

Levels.4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

INEDUC.Description: Co-participant's years of education, use the codes below to report the level achieved; if an attempted level is not completed, enter the number of years completed

INRELTO.Description: What is co-participant's relationship to subject?

Levels.5: Friend, neighbor, or someone known through family,friends,work,or community
Levels.6: Paid caregiver, health care provider, or clinician

INKNOWN.Description: How long has the co-participant known the subject?

INLIVWTH.Description: Does the co-participant live with the subject?

INVISITS.Description: If no, approximate frequency of in-person visits? (Blank if INLIVWTH = 1)

INRELY.Description: Is there a question about the co-participant's reliability?
